issue.title: [R] segfault with ArrowObject from previous session, or saved
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10071](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10071). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
library(arrow, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

a <- Array$create(1:10)
 tf <- tempfile()
 saveRDS(a, tf)

b <- readRDS(tf)
 b$length()

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10071?focusedCommentId=17202668) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8246
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8246>
